description:
Hands are hard. If your hand were a video game character, you'd need 27 buttons to control it. We're looking at how AI helped lend scientists working on prosthetics a hand.

#inanutshell #kurzgesagt #kurzgesagt_inanutshell #learnwithshorts #science #scienceshorts #prosthetics #prosthetichand
